subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk, who entered the final round of the W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational with a one-stroke lead, double bogeyed on the final hole, handing victory to Keegan Bradley.
snippet: Jim Furyk, who entered the final round of the W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational with a one-stroke lead, double bogeyed on the final hole, handing victory to Keegan Bradley.
